title: Shaky Lag
body: So I did a full scan on my computer, uninstalled a few things, and did a clean up.  Every time I play league and have a site up to listen to music while playing the screen does not minimize. So I Tab out and minimize and the shaky lag stops, after a few seconds the shaky lag seems to happen again. So that is my problem while playing league and this has never happened. Even if I don't have anything up the LEAGUE CLIENT unminimizes  itself and then I continue to get the shaky lag. Can someone please explain why this is happening? I even restarted my computer as well. SOS

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean by shaky lag.  What happens if you switch to Windowed or Borderless video mode, instead of fullscreen?  What operating system are you using? I'm not sure if you're describing an fps or latency issue, so if possible run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview.  Let me know what you find.
My FPS will go from 26 to the 40's which makes that certain lag happen
I see, thanks for the additional info!  Were you able to find some results from the log reader in the meantime?

So sorry i got back late to answer (had family death).

So anyway I actually did check the log reader and it said it spikes up to 30 from 26. but there is no real issue. So basically its telling me everything is okay. Alright so I thought it was me.

So I went through my pc and did another clean up and deleted games as well. After that played a game, still studder shaky lag.

After that, I even uninstalled chrome and league of legends. Played a game, and still studder shaky lag.

And my pc is at least 2-3 years old updated, it's a lenovo desktop specifically for gaming. 

I mean the shaky studder lag is playable because fortunately there is no delay, although it does make me miss the minions.

So yea I tried everything possible except a system restore but i dont think there is a need to. 


It's really bumming out my league experience. playable! but to an extent. I never had this problem. I played more games throughout this convo to see if the lag passes by but still nothing either.

I played other games and I dont get the same problem. But who doesnt wana play league? <3 help

Tried this 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update

and it seems to be okay

I'm really sorry to hear about that, and wishing you all the best.  It's good to hear that the issue seems to be resolved for now.  If you run into it again, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to assist individually with your specific issue.  <3
Thank you so much! My brother had the same problem btw, I told him to do the same thing and it worked.. hm I guess that xbox app is a problem lol
What I mean by shaky lag is that it looks flaky (tiny studders) while in game. I am full mode screen.

I'm also getting this problem. Pretty much my champion is just stuttering as I walk and everything feels shaky. I've tried swapping from Borderless (which i'm set on) to full screen and get the same issue. When I switch to Windowed it fixes, although I don't like playing on windowed and hopefully this can be noticed/fixed
